note.p: Illustrator and author. Daughter of Alexander and Albinia Elizabeth Gordon. Married Richard Cavendish Townshend Boyle in 1845. Illustrated several books, mostly fairy tales or nursery rhymes, 1852–77. Re-created an extensive garden at Huntercombe Manor near Burnham and wrote on gardens and nature. Involved in charitable work and a patron of the Frome School of Art from 1868.
